law.text:
As used in KRS 246.660, unless the context clearly requires otherwise:
"Harvest" means to take any part of the ginseng plant while the plant is living; and
"Ginseng" means any part of the American ginseng plant known as Panax quinquefolius.
law.history: Amended 2011 Ky. Acts ch. 15, sec. 1, effective June 8, 2011. -- Created 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 415, sec. 1, effective July 15, 1982.
